  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_327</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_327</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Teselación del plano</string>
            <string language="en">Tessellating the plane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tessellating die Fläche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tessellating l'avion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tessellating o plano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tessellating l'aereo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Tessellating το αεροπλάνο</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las diferentes posiblidades de teselación con polígonos del plano. Se introducen también los conceptos de mosaicos regulares y semirregulares.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to study the different possible tessellations of a plane with polygons. It also introduces the concept of regular and semiregular mosaics.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plana</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">traslación</string>
            <string language="en">translation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teselas</string>
            <string language="en">tiles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">polígonos</string>
            <string language="en">polygons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">regulares</string>
            <string language="en">regular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">mosaicos</string>
            <string language="en">mosaics</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die unterschiedlichen möglichen tessellations einer 
Fläche mit Polygonen zu studieren. Sie stellt auch das Konzept 
der regelmäßigen und semiregular Mosaiken vor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'étudier les différents tessellations possibles d'un 
avion avec des polygones. Il présente également le concept des
mosaïques régulières et semiregular.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações estudar 
os tessellations possíveis diferentes de um plano com polygons. 
Introduz também o conceito de mosaics regulares e semiregular.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
studiare i tessellations possibili differenti di un aereo con i 
poligoni. Egualmente introduce il concetto dei mosaici normali e
semiregular.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να μελετήσει τα διαφορετικά πιθανά tessellations ενός 
αεροπλάνου με τα πολύγωνα. Εισάγει επίσης την έννοια των 
κανονικών και semiregular μωσαϊκών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fläche</string>
          </keyword>
